CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper December 15, 1956, pg. 2, reads: "Banned at Rink - Sharon Gray, Michael Reddick and Jean Conway, the latter two being pupils at Wilkinsburg Junior High School, were banned from attending a party which their class held last Friday at Lexington Skating Rink, Broad and Larimer A., East Liberty. Rink attendants denied them entrance after telling them that they would have to belong to a skating club to which, according to a teacher, other members of the class didn't belong but were admitted. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Sharon Gray, Michael Reddick, and Jean Conway posed after being denied admittance to Lexington Skating Rink, in interior with floral wallpaper
